mapper.insert: insert into PetHotelReservation (phr_num, c_num,p_num, ph_num, phr_chekin, phr_chekout, phr_status) values (pethotelreservation_seq.nextval, #{c_num}, #{p_num}, #{ph_num}, #{phr_chekin}, #{phr_chekout}, #{phr_status} )
mapper.update: update PetHotelReservation set phr_chekin=#{phr_chekin}, phr_chekout=#{phr_chekout}, where phr_num = #{phr_num}
